name: Simple! Pong [Raylib]
description:
My very first game made with C++, Student Project.

Simple Pong! is based on one of the most famous videogames in the industry. Using raylib, I remade the game adding features such as a menu and different difficulties for the AI. Being my first game, I am greatly satisfied with the results and I hope I get feedback so I can improve. I will try to update the game with bugfixes as much as I can

Enjoy!

Tools Used:
Raylib
Bosca Ceoil
Bfxr
